import React from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import RenderProducts from './components/checkout/RenderProducts'; import RenderCart from './components/checkout/RenderCart'; const CheckoutScreen = ({ cart, decrementAmount, incrementAmount, removeFromCart } ) => { function totalPriceProduct(index) { return (cart[index].price*cart[index].amount) } let totalPriceCart = cart.reduce(function(prev, current) { return prev + +current.price*current.amount }, 0); return (

My Cart

PRODUCTS

PRICE

QTY

TOTAL

{cart.map((product, index) => (

{ product.name }

€ { product.price }

{ product.amount }

€ { totalPriceProduct(index) }

))}

SUBTOTAL: € { totalPriceCart }


); }; export default CheckoutScreen;
